msg.msgText: A call to send() or publish() to {0} {1} from producer {2} failed because the message size exceeds the maximum size permitted by Message Gateway endpoint {3}.

msgExplanation.p: The size of a JMS message object sent to Message Gateway endpoint must be less than or equal to the maximum message size configured for the endpoint.

msgUserResponse.p: If appropriate, the Message Gateway administrator can modify the configuration for the endpoint.
